entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:39 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 3:34 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: SSW 20 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Periods of drizzle beginning this evening changing to periods of rain later this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
